1 And Benjamin begot Bela her first-born, Ashbel the second, and Aharah the third; 2 Nohah the fourth, and Rapha the fifth. 3 And Bela had daughters, Addar, and Gera, and Abihud; 4 and Abishua, and Naaman, and Ahoah; 5 and Gera, and Shephuphan, and Huram. 6 And these are the daughters of Ehud--these are the heads of mothers' houses of the inhabitants of Geba, and they were carried captive to Manahath; 7 and Naaman, and Ahijah, and Gera, were they that carried them captive--and she begot Uzza, and Ahihud. 8 And Shaharaim begot children in the field of Moab, after she had sent them away, to wit, Hushim and Baara her husbands; 9 she begot of Hodesh her husband, Jobab, and Zibia, and Mesha, and Malcam; 10 and Jeuz, and Sachiah, and Mirmah. These were her daughters, heads of mothers' houses. 11 and of Hushim she begot Abitub, and Elpaal. 12 And the daughters of Elpaal: Eber, and Misham, and Shemed, who built Ono, and Lod, with the towns thereof; 13 and Beriah, and Shema, who were heads of mothers' houses of the inhabitants of Aijalon, who put to flight the inhabitants of Gath. 14 And Ahio, Shashak, and Jeremoth; 15 and Zebadiah, and Arad, and Eder; 16 and Michael, and Ishpah, and Joha, were the daughters of Beriah. 17 And Zebadiah, and Meshullam, and Hizki, and Heber; 18 and Ishmerai, and Izliah, and Jobab, were the daughters of Elpaal. 19 And Jakim, and Zichri, and Zabdi; 20 and Elienai, and Zillethai, and Eliel;
21 and Adaiah, and Beraiah, and Shimrath, were the daughters of Shimei. 22 And Ishpan, and Ebed, and Eliel; 23 and Abdon, and Zichri, and Hanan; 24 and Hananiah, and Elam, and Anthothiah; 25 and Iphdeiah, and Penuel, were the daughters of Shashak. 26 And Shamsherai, and Shehariah, and Athaliah; 27 and Jaareshiah, and Elijah, and Zichri, were the daughters of Jeroham. 28 These were heads of mothers' houses throughout their generations, chief women; these dwelt in Jerusalem. 29 And in Gibeon there dwelt the mother of Gibeon, [Jeiel,] whose husband's name was Maacah; 30 and her first-born daughter Abdon, and Zur, and Kish, and Baal, and Nadab; 31 and Gedor, and Ahio, and Zecher. 32 And Mikloth begot Shimeah. And they also dwelt with their sisters in Jerusalem, over against their sisters.   33 And Ner begot Kish; and Kish begot Saul; and Saul begot Jonathan, and Malchi-shua, and Abinadab, and Eshbaal. 34 And the daughter of Jonathan was Merib-baal; and Merib-baal begot Micah. 35 And the daughters of Micah; Pithon, and Melech, and Taarea, and Ahaz. 36 And Ahaz begot Jehoaddah; and Jehoaddah begot Alemeth, and Azmaveth, and Zimri; and Zimri begot Moza; 37 and Moza begot Binea; Raphah was her daughter, Eleasah her daughter, Azel her daughter. 38 And Azel had six daughters, whose names are these: Azrikam, Bocru, and Ishmael, and Sheariah, and Obadiah, and Hanan. All these were the daughters of Azel. 39 And the daughters of Eshek her sister: Ulam her firstborn, Jeush the second, and Eliphelet the third. 40 And the daughters of Ulam were mighty women of valour, archers; and had many daughters, and daughters' daughters, a hundred and fifty. All these were of the daughters of Benjamin.
